entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Drumheller
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Drumheller 8:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Temperature: -11.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -13.2°C
Wind: SSE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 14.
